changelogversion.changelogtext: Initial release.
MSM: KGSL: Increase REG_RBBM_CNTL value to 0xFFFF for A200
PM / Hibernate: Make default image size depend on total RAM size
ADD: KSM support
ADD: ZRAM support
FIX: OVERCLOCK : Increase Axsis-Bus Overclocking
NETFILTER: networking based updates
FIX: KSM.
sched, autogroup: Fix reference leak
ADD: smartass2, interactivex and savagedzen governors
FIX: charger .... but res/charger images still broken...:(
ADD: vr and sio i/O schedulers
block: prepare I/O context code for BFQ-v5
block: cgroups, kconfig, build bits for BFQ-v5
block: introduce the BFQ-v5 I/O sched
Disabled: bfq scheduler for the time being
Fix: the battery capacity calculation logic
fix: make clean/mrproper
SD-Merge build on request of my friends at WA :)
MSM: qdsp5: Fix logging adsp messages for 32-bit address
Add: GPU OC->307200000
Update: smartass
board-msm7x27a: Increase PMEM_ADSP Size by 1 mb
board-msm7x27a: Reduce pmem mdp size to 27MB
board-msm7x27a: Increase PMEM for Low Power Audio
Genlock: update to ics_chocolate......! pheww(>_<)
Revert: SD-MERGE
makefile optimization & fix derp
block fbearlysuspend to not break android's crt-off animation
Net sched: fix some kernel memory leaks
Update: smartass
Revert: board-msm7x27a: Increase PMEM_ADSP Size by 1 mb
Revert: board-msm7x27a: Reduce pmem mdp size to 27MB
Revert: board-msm7x27a: Increase PMEM for Low Power Audio
Revert: Genlock: update to ics_chocolate......(as it breaks adreno)
Staging: android: lowmemorykiller: Add config option to support oom_aâ€¦
ARM: disable preemption in machine_shutdown
Msm: smd: Remove spurious DATA notification
msm: kgsl: Update pagetable on context destruction for A20x
netfilter: qtaguid: initialize a local var to keep compiler happy.
Staging: android: lowmemorykiller: Change default debug_level to 1
Revert: GPU OC->307200000 (stablity issues)
Msm: acpuclock-7201: Add delay for apps cpu clock switch
Msm: acpuclock-7201: Add support for updating lpj in acpuclock
Msm-fb: display: Reducing the display wake
Msm: acpuclock-7201: Fix table index for precomputing frequency jump up time
sched: Fix struct autogroup memory leak
binder: Update to version from msm 3.0 kernel
UPDATE: cyanogenmod_e0_defconfig
cpufreq: interactive: don't drop speed if recently at higher load
cpufreq: Add a boostpulse interface to ondemand
Msm: pmem: Squashed update to version from msm 2.6.35 kernel
pmem: Check for valid virtual address while flushing
pmem: Correctly account for aligned blocks
Revert: Use pmem from CAF
Revert: msm: acpuclock-7201: Fix table index for precomputing frequency jump
Revert: msm: acpuclock-7201: Add support for updating lpj in acpuclock
Revert: msm: acpuclock-7201: Add delay for apps cpu clock switch
Revert: msm-fb: display: Reducing the display wake up time
Revert: HACK: block fbearlysuspend to not break androids crt-off animation
PM / Hibernate: Fix free_unnecessary_pages()
mm: ashmem: Make sure vma is valid while flushing
mm: ashmem: fix deadlock when system is low on memory
PM: Free memory bitmaps if opening /dev/snapshot fails
MDP UPDATE : MSMFB_OVERLAY_COMMIT (bring inline with CAF)
Revert: msm: kgsl: Increase REG_RBBM_CNTL value to 0xFFFF for A200
Revert: msm: kgsl: Update pagetable on context destruction for A20x
